TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridTableStylesCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class GridTableStylesCollection Inherits BaseCollection Implements IList
public ref class GridTableStylesCollection : System::Windows::Forms::BaseCollection, System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 表示 控制項中 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含物件，可讓控制項來顯示每個自訂的格線樣式中。The contains objects that allows the control to display a customized grid style for each in a . 在控制項，屬性會傳回。On the control, the property returns the . 根據預設，不包含任何物件。By default, the does not contain any objects. 相反地，會顯示每個資料表使用的色彩、 寬度和格式設定的預設設定。Instead, the displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting. 會顯示每個資料表的所有資料行。All columns of each table are displayed. 當加入至集合，使用來判斷哪些物件會提供資料方格。When a is added to the collection, the uses the to determine which object supplies the data for the grid. 例如，如果資料來源是，其中包含三個物件必須符合的其中一個物件。For example, if the data source is a that contains three objects, the must match the of one of the objects. 如果不符合任何值、 預設設定將用來顯示每個資料表的資料和設定將被忽略。If the does not match any of the values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the settings will be ignored. > [!CAUTION] > 永遠建立物件，並將其新增至加入之前物件加入至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 或者，清除使用方法。Alternatively, clear the using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立兩個物件，並將每個要傳回屬性控制項。The following code example creates two objects and adds each to the returned by the property of a control. [!code-cpp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CPP/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CS/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/VB/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.vb#1)]
